installationReceipt.explanation: Zephyr is a package of Mesquite modules designed to allow Mesquite to interact with phylogenetic inference programs. For example, you can ask Mesquite to send a matrix to RAxML, have RAxML search for maximum likelihood trees, and then harvest the results automatically back into Mesquite. For more information about the features of Zephyr, see the Zephyr web page. (3)

notice.beforeMessage: This may take a while to download; please wait until a message appears saying it's finished.
notice.explanation: Zephyr is a package of Mesquite modules designed to allow Mesquite to interact with phylogenetic inference programs. For example, you can ask Mesquite to send a matrix to RAxML, have RAxML search for maximum likelihood trees, andthen harvest the results automatically back into Mesquite.For more information about the features of Zephyr, see the Zephyr web page. (3)

installationReceipt.explanation: The Tree Set Visualization package is capable of summarizing large sets of phylogenetic trees. It depicts a "tree space" using multi-dimensional scaling based on tree-to-tree distance metrics. For more information, see the Tree Set Visualization web page.

notice.explanation: The Tree Set Visualization package is capable of summarizing large sets of phylogenetic trees. It depicts a "tree space" using multi-dimensional scaling based on tree-to-tree distance metrics.For more information, see theTree Set Visualization web page.

installationReceipt.explanation: Chromaseq is a package of Mesquite modules designed for analyzing chromatograms, by making contigs, allowing one to view chromatograms from within Mesquite, make base calls, etc., with the help of Phred and Phrap. It also provides tools for submission of sequences to GenBank. For more information about the features of Chromaseq, see the Chromaseq web page. (3)

notice.beforeMessage: This may take a while to download; please wait until a message appears saying it's finished.
